price: Therefore Allah conferred favor upon us and protected us from the punishment of the Scorching Fire.
arabic: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ
